title: Voidslime (“VOLTAGE” Special)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of each night, before actions are processed, you will be provided with a list of all effects that would happen, unless you chose to use Void Storm on that night. You may choose up to one of them. It doesn't happen, and is instead stored within your Void Storm.
- You have 12 hours to make your decision after actions are processed.
- You may not share the information you receive.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Void Storm:** At night, cause every effect you have prevented from happening since the last time you used Void Storm to happen all at once. You may choose which players are targeted by each effect, if applicable.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 4296
*It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary.*
